Language.Text:
Day Fourteen.
We made camp by the giant gate, which rises high above our heads. It is very decorated by writings and symbols, which we're unable to read. According to Navi it should be a partition between the Outer and Middle section of the Labyrinth.
Now to only discover how to open it.
